data.title: Circle Christian Schools
data.meta_description: Since 2001, Circle Christian School has been a part of the Florida High School Athletics Association (FHSAA). We hope this website will give you a glimpse
data.text:
At Circle Christian School, our goal for athletics centers on God’s glory being displayed through teams that love Christ. We strive to provide an environment where student-athletes learn to work hard, pursue excellence, and grow in faith while valuing and considering others.

Who We Are

Since 2001, Circle Christian School has been a part of the Florida High School Athletics Association (FHSAA). We hope this website will give you a glimpse into who we are and the importance we place on athletics in helping our student-athletes better prepare for the future—physically, relationally, and spiritually.

Michael Simmonds, Director of Spiritual Formation and Athletics

Barbara Cazel, Athletics Administrative Assistant

A Wide Array of Sports

Fall Sports

VARSITY, JUNIOR VARSITY, AND MIDDLE SCHOOL VOLLEYBALL

This is the third year of the resurgence of volleyball at Circle. The season begins early August and runs through Mid October. Team tryouts are open to girls 5th - 8th (Middle School Team), and 9th - 12th (Varsity and JV). For more information, click the FAQ link below.

Head Coach: Mila Serrano volleyball@circlechristianschool.org

Varsity Volleyball Montage

For exact dates, registration, coach contact and more information, please check out the

GIRLS & BOYS VARSITY

The Cross Country season officially begins early August and runs 8-12 weeks. The sport is open to all students in grades 6-12. There are a boys and girl Varsity and Middle School teams and all teams practice together. A typical season includes 5-9 meets with most being held on Saturday mornings.

Head Coach: TBD

Middle School Coach: Steven Kirwan -Stevek@circlechristianschool.org

Girls XC Montage

Boys XC Montage

For exact dates, registration, coach contact and more information, please check out the Cross Country FAQs

GIRLS VARSITY

The Girls Golf Season begins early August and runs 10-13 weeks. The sport is open to all students in grades 6-12. A typical season includes 5-14 event competitions. The Girls team has finished in the top 4 in the last 5 Class 1A State Championships winning in 2013 and Runners-up in 2014 and 2015.

Head Coach: TBD

girlsgolf@circlechristianschool.org

BOYS VARSITY

The Boys Golf Season begins on early August and runs 10-13 weeks. The sport is open to all students in grades 6-12. A typical season includes 5-14 event competitions with most being held during the week.

Head Coach: Wade Gossett

boysgolf@circlechristianschool.org

BOYS VARSITY PHOTO MONTAGE

For exact dates, registration, coach contact and more information, please check out the Golf FAQs

VARSITY

The Bowling Season officially begins early August and runs through late October. The sport is open to all students in grades 6-12. There are boys and girls Varsity and JV teams and all teams practice together. A typical varsity regular season includes 12 - 18 matches and tournaments.

JV/MS

The Bowling Season officially begins early August and runs through late October. The sport is open to all students in grades 6-12. There are boys and girls Varsity and JV/MS teams and all teams practice together. A typical varsity regular season includes 12 - 18 matches and tournaments.

Head Coach: Rusty Barber

bowling@circlechristianschool.org

This year Rusty Barber is in his fourth season as Head Coach of Circle.

Bowling Montage

For exact dates, registration, coach contact and other information, please check out the Bowling FAQs

CO-ED MIDDLE SCHOOL

Co-Ed Middle School soccer is geared toward developing players to compete at the Varsity/JV level. The team competes in the Central Florida Metro League (CFML) and plays 8 - 10 games per season.

Head Coach: TBD

For exact dates, registration, coach contact and other information, please check out the MS CO-ED SOCCER FAQS

BOYS & GIRLS VARSITY

The Swimming season begins on early August and runs 10-13 weeks. The sport is open to all students in grades 6-12. There is a varsity boys, varsity girls, and a middle school team.

Head Coach: Jeannie Caporaso

swimming@circlechristianschool.org

SWIMMING PHOTO MONTAGE

For exact dates, registration, coach contact and other information, please check out the

Winter Sports

Basketball season starts end of October through February. During winter season tryouts, we fill teams for Boys Varsity Basketball, JV Basketball, 7/8 Grade Basketball, and 5/6 Grade.

The Varsity season typically includes 15-25 games that are generally played 2-3 times per week on Tuesday through Friday.

Head Coach: Mark King

boysbasketball@circlechristianschool.org

For exact dates, registration, coach contact and other information, please check out the BASKETBALL FAQS

BOYS VARSITY

The Varsity Boys Soccer season begins mid October and runs 10-14 weeks. The sport is open to all students in grades 6-12. A typical season includes 1-2 matches each week.

Head Coach: Jeremy Reddy

boyssoccer@circlechristianschool.org

Coach Jeremy Reddy, enters his 5th year as the Boys Soccer Coach. He is a soccer specialist at Athletes In Action whose mission is to help sports-minded people think and live biblically.

GIRLS VARSITY

The Varsity Girls Soccer season begins on mid October and runs 10-14 weeks. The sport is open to all students in grades 6-12. A typical season includes 1-2 matches each week.

Head Coach: Christina Gore

christinag@circlechristianschool.org

For exact dates, registration, coach contacts and other information, please check out the SOCCER FAQS

Spring Sports

The Track & Field Season season begins in January and runs 10-13 weeks. The sport is open to all students in grades 5th - 12th. There are boys and girls Varsity, JV, and Middle School teams and all teams practice together. A typical season includes 1 meet per week for a total of 5-9 meets.

GIRLS TRACK PHOTO MONTAGE

Middle School Track

The Boys & Girls Middle School Track & Field season begins in January and runs 8-10 weeks. The sport is open to all students in grades 5th - 8th. The team participates in 5-6 meets on Thursdays through the Central Florida Metro League (CFML).

MIDDLE SCHOOL TRACK HIGHLIGHT REEL

For exact dates, registration, coach contact and more information, please check out the TRACK AND FIELD FAQ

The Tennis season begins in January and runs 10-13 weeks. The sport is open to all students in grades 6-12. There are boys and girls Varsity, JV and MS teams and all teams practice together at the same time and location. This year's practices and home matches will be played at Sanlando Park in Altamonte Springs. A typical season includes 1-2 matches each week.

Tennis photo montage

Head Coach: Tony Domenech

Coach Tony enters his 20th season as defending District Champions. He is a tireless teacher of the game and has the respect of peers for his years of serving the tennis community.

For exact dates, contact and more information please check out the

The Middle School and Varsity baseball season is from late January to mid-April. Postseason competition time will vary depending on how well we compete during the regular season. We compete against schools in the Central Florida Metro League and the Citrus League. There are typically 8 - 10 games in a regular middle school season.

Head Coach: Jon Waldrop

Baseball Montage

For exact dates, registration, coach contact and other information, please check out the

Baseball FAQs

Lower School Sports

We are excited to be partnering with Dreadhead for another great season of track and field. This program introduces young athletes to a wide variety of track and field disciplines. Practice is one day a week and meets are about 90 minutes on a Saturday morning. Click here to learn more about Dreadhead or to register your athlete K - 5th grade.

Who: 3 Years to 5th Grade • Boys & Girls

All schools are welcome

Seminole & Orange Counties

What: Dreadhead Spring Track Program

Where: The Geneva School • 1775 Seminola Blvd Casselberry

For more information and registration: Dreadhead registration

Go Young Centurions!

LS Basketball season begins the week of January 10th. Thursday, January 13th is first practice. The season ends in early March.

For exact dates, registration, contact and other information, please check out the
